game.title: Dragon Hunt
game.description: You have been tasked to defeat the fire-breathing dragon that has been terrorizing the village. Use your skills and cunning to defeat the dragon and bring peace back to the kingdom.

task.description: Start by traveling through the treacherous Dark Forest, cross the Golden River, and then climb the Deathly Mountains to find the dragon's lair.
Once you reach the dragon's lair, confront and defeat the fire-breathing dragon.
